messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: introduction - Deb
messages.msgSnippet: Yol I am in Shelby Blessings. Deb ... From: bluelotus [mailto:bluelotus@att.net] Sent: Wednesday, January 15, 2003 1:51 PM To: Unschooling.com Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Yol

I am in Shelby

Blessings.
Deb


-----Original Message-----
From: bluelotus [mailto:bluelotus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 15, 2003 1:51 PM
To: Unschooling.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: introduction - Deb

<<I wish I knew folks around here who had kids willing to take a step
into an

uncharted realm of discovery, thinking about justice and peace.
I am in NC. Anybody nearby? >>

Deb>>

Hi Deb,

As far as I know, Teresa, Pam G. and I are in NC. Anyone else? Where in NC
are you?

Yol
